column1: Smoque BBQ////We don't love BBQ in our house
column2: but when we're in the mood
column3: this is the only place we'll go. The place is a bit disorganized
column4: but it contributes to the very casual atmosphere. Wish they had a dedicated take-out lane for newcomers (you can just cut to the front
column5: which not everyone is comfortable with)
column6: but it's hard to do everything with so little space. Overall
column7: Smoque is a must in NW Chicago!
